00025 #include "OgreString.h"
00026 
00027 #include "OgreStringVector.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Ogre {
00030 
00031     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00032     void String::trim(bool left, bool right)
00033     {
00034         size_t lspaces, rspaces, len = length(), i;
00035 
00036         lspaces = rspaces = 0;
00037 
00038         if( left )
00039         {
00040             // Find spaces / tabs on the left
00041             for( i = 0;
00042                 i < len && ( at(i) == ' ' || at(i) == '\t' || at(i) == '\r');
00043                 ++lspaces, ++i );
00044         }
00045         
00046         if( right && lspaces < len )
00047         {
00048             // Find spaces / tabs on the right
00049             for( i = len - 1;
00050                 i >= 0 && ( at(i) == ' ' || at(i) == '\t' || at(i) == '\r');
00051                 rspaces++, i-- );
00052         }
00053 
00054         *this = substr(lspaces, len-lspaces-rspaces);
00055     }
00056 
00057     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058     std::vector<String> String::split( const String& delims, unsigned int maxSplits) const
00059     {
00060         // static unsigned dl;
00061         std::vector<String> ret;
00062         unsigned int numSplits = 0;
00063 
00064         // Use STL methods 
00065         size_t start, pos;
00066         start = 0;
00067         do 
00068         {
00069             pos = find_first_of(delims, start);
00070             if (pos == start)
00071             {
00072                 // Do nothing
00073                 start = pos + 1;
00074             }
00075             else if (pos == npos || (maxSplits && numSplits == maxSplits))
00076             {
00077                 // Copy the rest of the string
00078                 ret.push_back( substr(start) );
00079             }
00080             else
00081             {
00082                 // Copy up to delimiter
00083                 ret.push_back( substr(start, pos - start) );
00084                 start = pos + 1;
00085             }
00086             // parse up to next real data
00087             start = find_first_not_of(delims, start);
00088             ++numSplits;
00089 
00090         } while (pos != npos);
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094         return ret;
00095     }
00096 
00097     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098     String String::toLowerCase(void)
00099     {
00100         std::transform(
00101             begin(),
00102             end(),
00103             begin(),
00104             static_cast<int(*)(int)>(::tolower) );
00105 
00106         return *this;
00107     }
00108 
00109     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00110     String String::toUpperCase(void)
00111     {
00112         std::transform(
00113             begin(),
00114             end(),
00115             begin(),
00116             static_cast<int(*)(int)>(::toupper) );
00117 
00118         return *this;
00119     }
00120     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     Real String::toReal(void)
00122     {
00123         return (Real)atof(this->c_str());
00124     }
00125 }
